Package com.example.inventorymanager

Class ItemUtility

java.lang.Object
com.example.inventorymanager.ItemUtility
public class ItemUtility extends Object
This is a utility class that contains helpful methods for handling item-related operations and validations. Various conditions are enforced on each field of an item, including:
  • The name is mandatory, must be no longer than 15 characters, and must be unique.
  • The date purchased is mandatory, must follow YYYY-MM-DD format, and must be in the past.
  • The description is optional and must be no longer than 20 characters.
  • The make is mandatory.
  • The make ismandatory.
  • The serial number is optional and must be no longer than 20 characters.
  • The estimated value is mandatory and must follow a monetary format (i.e., "$NNN,NNN.NN")
  • The comment is optional and must be no longer than 20 characters.
Author:
Kareem Assaf, Isaac Joffe

    • validateItemFields

      public static boolean validateItemFields(android.widget.EditText itemNameInput, android.widget.EditText purchaseDateInput, android.widget.EditText descriptionInput, android.widget.EditText makeInput, android.widget.EditText modelInput, android.widget.EditText serialNumberInput, android.widget.EditText estimatedValueInput, android.widget.EditText commentInput, String oldName, ItemViewModel itemViewModel)
      Validates the input fields for an item, ensuring that mandatory and optional fields meet specific criteria.
      Parameters:
      itemNameInput - The EditText for the item name.
      purchaseDateInput - The EditText for the purchase date.
      descriptionInput - The EditText for the item description.
      makeInput - The EditText for the item's make.
      modelInput - The EditText for the item's model.
      serialNumberInput - The EditText for the item's serial number.
      estimatedValueInput - The EditText for the item's estimated value.
      commentInput - The EditText for additional comments.
      Returns:
      True if all fields are valid; false otherwise.
